title: From the Vault: Melt With Me
itunes:title: From the Vault: Melt With Me
description:
From the horror of “melt movies,” in which the melting human takes on nightmaric qualities, to far more benign and even sublime takes on the concept of the melt, there does seem to be something to our fascination with personal phase transition. In this classic episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind, Robert and Joe try to figure out what it all means. (originally published 11/5/2020)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
